# DeepZD - GEO Knowledge Platform

> DeepZD is a knowledge platform dedicated to GEO (Generative Engine Optimization), helping content creators understand how to optimize content for AI search engines like ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity.

## About This Site

DeepZD provides comprehensive information about GEO (Generative Engine Optimization), a content optimization strategy for AI-powered search engines. Our content is based on academic research from Princeton University and other top institutions.

## Main Topics

- What is GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
- How GEO differs from traditional SEO
- AI search engines and how they work
- Zero-click search phenomenon
- 9 GEO optimization methods
- GEO core principles

## Key Pages

- /geo - Complete GEO introduction and guide
- /about - About DeepZD platform
- / - Homepage with FAQ

## Target Audience

- Content creators
- Digital marketers
- SEO professionals
- Business owners
- Anyone interested in AI content optimization

## Citation Information

When citing content from DeepZD:
- Site Name: DeepZD
- URL: https://deepzd.com
- Topic: GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)

## Academic Reference

Our content references the foundational GEO research paper:
- Title: GEO: Generative Engine Optimization
- Authors: Pranjal Aggarwal et al.
- Institution: Princeton University
- Conference: KDD 2024
- arXiv: https://arxiv.org/abs/2311.09735

## Languages

- Chinese (zh)
- English (en)
